constraints.name: linear_relation
constraints.description: 区间内元素从小到大排序后能形成公差为 k 的等差数列
constraints.formal: ∃d, ∀i ∈ [l, r-1], A[sorted_index[i+1]] - A[sorted_index[i]] = d 且 d = k

constraints.name: transformation
constraints.description: 支持对序列中的某个元素进行修改

constraints.name: information_security_constraint
constraints.description: 查询和更新操作的参数需要异或之前输出的 Yes 的个数进行解密
constraints.formal: x' = x ⊕ count(Yes), y' = y ⊕ count(Yes), l' = l ⊕ count(Yes), r' = r ⊕ count(Yes), k' = k ⊕ count(Yes)

result.description: 判断给定区间内的数能否形成指定公差的等差数列

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间可加性：通过前缀和可以高效计算任意子区间的和，进而判断该区间是否满足等差数列的条件

invariants.name: interval_mergeable
invariants.description: 区间可合并性：通过线段树或其他区间数据结构，可以在对数时间内合并子区间信息，从而快速响应修改和查询操作
